title: Confusion about ocean week rewards.
body:
Yo I'm confused, I do not have all of the champions in the game and I just received a mystery skin from Riot.
Why did I not receive a champion?

replies.body: The Mystery Champion reward works the same was as when it is purchasable in the store - it is only possible to get when there are more than ten champions costing greater than 450IP that you do not own.  Basically, if that wasn't the case for you, you will have received a Mystery Skin.

I may be misinterpreting what you're saying, but I have all but 8 champions and I received a skin?
121 champions total.

I misworded what I meant up there - I'll edit my post to be clearer! 

With only 8 champs left to get, you would have recieved a skin instead of a champion. You need at least 10 champions worth over 450IP unowned to get a Mystery Champion.
Ahh okie dokie, all good thanks for clearing that up :)
